title: Help, I cant connect to chat!

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body: I just wanna play with my friends. Sometimes it loads the client normally sometimes it doesn't. The second image is just a bonus bug. Hopefully this is in the right thread thing. First time posting here.

replies.body: Thanks for the screenshot!  It looks like something might be specifically blocking you from connecting to pvp.net.  It's important to resolve this incase of other blocks along the way, like reaching the game server.  You'll want to go over each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot this.  Hope that helps, and welcome to the boards!

I've figured out what was causing it. My anti-virus, Avast, was blocking quite a bit of stuff. It was also slowing my load for post-game lobby. Hopefully this helps anyone else that was having or will have this problem. I don't know how to mark this as Solved*.
